name: Timothy Shift
description:
Game Concept!

This game was made for the Mini Jame Gam

Controls

WASD for movement

Z for reality shifting 

Space for Jumping

Credit where credit is due!

Here are the awesome people who worked on this project!

Main Menu, Health System, Telephone Booth, Shop Script, Level Management, Level 1 Design support, Item Implementation

Player Controller Base (Movement & Jumping) , Version control setup support

Wall Jumping, Player Controller Tweaking, General Programming, Enemy AI, Bug Fixing, Level Management, Level 2 Design
